attributes.additional_details: i just would like to see this get banned as it’s not good for them to be inside all the time playing this game and not going out in the good weather having fun
attributes.background: I have now seen loads of teenager boys get obsessive and visios at this game and I’m starting to realise that they have no social life

rejection.details: While we can see that you're concerned about people's experience of gaming, this is something that the Government or Parliament aren't responsible for.
